scenario_text.value: *huff* *huff* *gasp* Did we...do it?
Ungh...!
No... Plutomon’s still breathing.
(But only just.)
(Now if only Aoi would come to her senses...)
Takuma...move.
What? K-Kaito?
I’ll...finish this.
Kaito?!
You can’t be serious!

Kaito, don’t do something now you’ll regret
later! Isn’t she one of your friends?!

Of course she is! That’s why nobody else can
do it, right?! So it has to be me—
Wait, no! We don’t need to finish her off.
Takuma...

...All right, but if she tries anything
funny, I’ll do it whether you like it or not.
And if it comes to that, I’ll help him.
All...all right.
Thank you, Kaito.

Come on, Aoi, it’s not too late. Please, give
up this madness and help us instead.

With all the power you have now, you should
be able to take Miyuki back from the Master.

And I’m sure we can find a way to get you
back to normal, too.
*gasp* *pant*... Why can’t you understand?
We were friends. How can you not see?

That’s what I thought. Sounds like you’re
still not ready to give up.
Kaito, stop! Just wait a second, okay?

I don’t know, Takuma. Aoi doesn’t seem like
she’s about to change her mind.

Of course not. After all, I’m the one who’s
right.

And the reason all our friends have died so
far is I allowed others to be wrong.

If I were to go along with you now, I would
be causing the death of more of my friends!

That’s just what I’m trying to stop! So
why...? Why do you interfere?!

Aoi, nobody wants this. Saki wouldn’t have
wanted this.

Don’t you try to tell me what Saki would’ve
wanted!!!

How could any of you possibly understand her?
You who selfishly cling to your lives!

No, the only one who could possibly know how
Saki would feel right now is me!

Takuma, are you satisfied now? Please, let me
put Aoi out of her misery.

A convenient excuse. What do you know of my
misery?

If you want to release me from it, then help
me get what I want.
You should all become one with me!

Aoi, I’m sorry...but we’ve got no other
choice!
You got that, Takuma?
Yeah... Do it!
Don’t worry, Aoi! We’ll find our way home—

Is that...really your biggest concern right
now?
Huh?
Ack... Gah...!
Huh?
Aaaaaaaaaaaarrrrrrgh!!!
T-Takuma! Renamon’s in some sort of pain!
Renamon? What’s wrong?!
Wh-what’s happening...to me?!
Renamon is...disappearing! No, it can’t be!!!
Is...is this really happening?!

Impossible! Why should Renamon disappear for
no apparent reason?
What’s going on here?!

There’s...there’s only one possible
explanation.
You mean...my sister?! No, Miyuki! Miyuki!!!

(No matter how hard the professor shakes her,
Miyuki’s not responding!)

(If anything, the light is leaving her
eyes...)
No, no, no! Miyuki, open your eyes!

No! I don’t want to disappear! I want to
protect Miyuki, keep her safe!
Miyuki!!!

Please...just one more time... Say my name...
Miyuki...
Oh... Oh no! Takuma! Renamon’s disappearing!

My precious...Miyuki... Bound to me by
fate... I always...wanted...to be...with—
Renamon! Renamon!!!

Heheheh... Looks like the Master’s taken
Miyuki in completely.

Aoi... No, Plutomon, did you know this would
happen?!

Did I? I wonder. But things were bound to end
up like this sooner or later.
You scheming little...
But don’t worry. I’ll save her.
You...you will?
I will take back everything she had...
...and use it to build my utopia!
What the?! What now?!

Oh my... That was earlier than I expected.
I’d better hurry!
Hold it! Where do you think you’re going?!

I’m afraid I must hurry on ahead of you to
the Master. So long, everyone! See you later.
Aoi? Hey, where’d she—
K-Kai—
Huh?! What happened to—

Takuma! Everyone’s disappeared! Even Dracumon
and the professor are gone!
What is this?!
I don’t know, but you’d better stay close to—
Agumon?! Agu—
